channel.title: Inserting & Removing Content on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Inserting & Removing Content on JavaScript

item.title: .append()
item.description: .append() Method Method used to insert content to the end of selected elements (as the last child) Example $(() => { $('#appendParagraph').click(() => { // append a new paragraph to list of paragraphs const newParagraph = "<p class='four'>Four</p>" $('.numbers').append(newParagraph) }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .prepend()
item.description: .prepend() Method Method used to insert content to the beginning of the selected elements (as the first child) Example $(() => { $('#prependParagraph').click(() => { // prepend a new paragraph to list of paragraphs const newParagraph = "<p class='one'>One</p>" $('.numbers').prepend(newParagraph) }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .before()
item.description: .before() Method Method is used to insert content before the selected elements Example $(() => { $('#addHeader').click(() => { // Add header "before" .numbers div const header = "<h2>Numbers</h2>" $('.numbers').before(header) }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com

item.title: .after()
item.description: .after() Method Method is used to insert content after the selected elements Example $(() => { $('#addFooter').click(() => { // Add footer "after" .numbers div const footer = "<h2>Footer</h2>" $('.numbers').after(footer) }) }) JS Bin on jsbin.com
